text: "So Amazing" is a 1983 song by Dionne Warwick and was taken from her studio album How Many Times Can We Say Goodbye. In 1987 Luther Vandross covered it and went to number 33 in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Dionne Warwick songs Category:Luther Vandross songs Category:Whitney Houston songs Category:Beyonc√© songs Category:Stevie Wonder songs
title: So Amazing (song)
